title: Welcoming valley: the mighty Murray
brief_description: Victorian Government promotional film extolling the virtues of the Murray River Valley as a tourist destination. Includes footage of Yarrawonga/Mulwala, Echuca, Cohuna, Kerang, Swan Hill and Mildura.
description: Victorian Government promotional film extolling the virtues of the Murray River Valley as a tourist destination. Includes footage of Yarrawonga/Mulwala, Echuca, Cohuna, Kerang, Swan Hill and Mildura.
